hero_greeting: Hi! I'm Carlos, a frontend developer passionate about clear, functional interfaces with personality.
hero_description: Focused on creating digital experiences where visual design and functionality go hand in hand. I'm passionate about transforming complex ideas into clear, accessible, and user-centered interfaces.
about_p1: I started in IT, but I discovered something important: I'm terrible at complex backend logic. And that's okay. Because my brain is wired for other things.
about_p2: I look at a website and automatically think: 'that button is poorly positioned,' 'those colors don't convey trust,' 'this flow confuses the user.' I can't help it. While others think about algorithms, I think about experiences.
about_p3: I focus on UI/UX and frontend because that's where I have real impact. I work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Figma to create interfaces where every element has a purpose. I don't do magic with databases, but I do transform complex information into something anyone can understand in seconds.
about_p4: I believe the best design is invisible: it works so well that no one notices your work, they just enjoy using it.
project_roquetes_desc: Official tourism website with interactive routes, event calendar, and multilingual system to promote local tourism.
project_organizer_desc: Automatic Bash script that organizes download files by type, improving system productivity.

quote_2: The best way to predict the future is to create it yourself.
